title: Missing Files
body:
i think the patcher client needs to scan the game files for missing files
i have just tried to enter a game and got an error saying that i could not launch the game because i have missing files
no i must repair my game and wait for it to download any missing files
by the time this is all finished my game will most likely be lost and my team mates will blame me 
therefore i suggest riot implements a way for the patcher to scan the game files to ensure there is no missing folders or files 

i understand this will be overlooked but i couldn't see a similar post an thought that this needed to be brought to attention

replies.body:
so apparently the "repair" button on the patcher does not fix missing files 
and now i have to delete and reinstall the entire game
